long_description: The Topeak Peakini 2 Master Blaster mini-pump features an efficient single-stroke pumping action that inflates tires up to 90 psi. T-handle provides solid grip and comfort while pumping. Works with both Presta and Schrader valves. Dust cap keeps internal pump head free from debris. The Topeak Peakini 2 Master Blaster mini-pump comes with a mounting bracket.
short_description: The Topeak Peakini 2 Master Blaster mini-pump features an efficient single-stroke pumping action that inflates tires up to 90 psi.
